bibl.title: The Binarism of Fragment and Whole: from the Jena Romantics to the 'New Sappho'.
bibl.note: 1. History of the binarism. - 2. Mid-twentieth century break-down of the binarism. - 3. Performance of archaic poetry and the binarism. - 4. Re-use in writing. - 5. A whole or a fragment? - 6. The 'New Sappho' [P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376 (= M.-P.3 1449.01; LDAB 10253)]. - 7. Fragment and part. - P. 103: Appendix [P. Oxy. XVIII, 2165 (= M.-P.3 62; LDAB 160), preserving Alcaeus frs. 129 V. and 130b V.].
bibl.seg: Lowell Edmunds, The Binarism of Fragment and Whole: from the Jena Romantics to the 'New Sappho'.

1. History of the binarism. - 2. Mid-twentieth century break-down of the binarism. - 3. Performance of archaic poetry and the binarism. - 4. Re-use in writing. - 5. A whole or a fragment? - 6.
